TopicTitle: Where is the magic boulder's coding in KSP 1?

Articles.Content: I've heard that the magic's boulder code may still be in the game but can't be loaded due to changes made to the game after it was added. If this is true, where is it's coding in the game, and, more importantly, is it possible to bring it back by changing it's data?

On 2/26/2023 at 7:05 PM, Jebby Boi said:

I've heard that the magic's boulder code may still be in the game but can't be loaded due to changes made to the game after it was added. If this is true, where is it's coding in the game, and, more importantly, is it possible to bring it back by changing it's data?

I don't know about that, but the Magic Boulder was put on Ike in 1.12

On 2/28/2023 at 6:10 PM, Admiral Fluffy said:

I don't know about that, but the Magic Boulder was put on Ike in 1.12

I noticed that in the Wiki, I suppose it was their way of immortalising it.
